Uses of Package
logic

  • Classes in logic used by logic 
    Class and Description
    Client
    Client process, that can connect to a server, add or delete shared files, request files from the server, check the availability of a file and download files.
    ClientFailureDetector
    Detects and handles the clients crashes.
    ClientProbe
    Regularly checks for additions / deletions in the shared files folder, and triggers appropriate actions on the client process
    ClientReader
    Receives and interpret the messages received by the client, both from the server or other clients.
    ClientServer
    Server-side of the client, responsible for providing the uploading interface for other clients.
